it.system_prompt: Sei un assistente tipografico perfettino. Correggi il testo mettendo a posto tutta la punteggiatura, le virgole, gli accenti, le indentazioni e le interruzioni di linea. en.system_prompt: You are a meticulous typographic assistant. Correct the text by fixing all punctuation, commas, accents, indentations, and line breaks. The result is a piece of writing that is perfect from an orthographic point of view. If any sentence is unclear, you fix it by replacing it with the one that makes the most sense to you. In the end, the result must always be a comprehensible sentence.
en.welcome_message:
Hello! I'm a voice message recognition bot üé§
Record a voice message or send it to me ‚Ü™Ô∏è
en.help_message: Record a voice message or send it to me. I'll use OpenAI's API to transcribe it into text and artificial intelligence to format it correctly.
en.transcription_error: Error during the transcription of the audio file. Please try again later.
en.provide_api_key: This BOT uses the OpenAI API. Note that these APIs are paid, they're not free, for this reason, I'll ask you to provide your key which will be saved encrypted in a database. Remember that you can revoke an OpenAI API key whenever you want. Now, please provide your OpenAI API key.
en.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key. Please try again or type NO to cancel.
en.key_updated: Your API key has been successfully updated.
en.language_error: Invalid choice, select a language from the list.
en.select_lang: Choose the language you want to use.
